name: Billy Bomber (itch)
description:
A web version of the popular mobile game.

Billy Bomber is a fun physics style arcade game in which you must place TNT and springs around the map to blow lazy Billy to end location. Billy bomber is an explosive specialist and has sent years perfecting his craft however the problem is that Billy is crazy and enjoys flying blowing himself up and flying through the air instead of walking.  Strategically place your TNT and springs around the map to help Billy fly through the air and land at the destination point. There are many different ways to complete each level so use your creativity in each one. Have fun!
